miniapp.name: Farcaster Wallet Search
miniapp.subtitle: Find Farcaster profiles by wallet addresses
miniapp.description: Search Farcaster profiles by wallet addresses and usernames with comprehensive Bankr integration. Supports Ethereum, Solana addresses and Farcaster usernames.
miniapp.tagline: Find Farcaster profiles linked to wallet addresses
miniapp.ogDescription: Search Farcaster profiles by wallet addresses and usernames with Bankr integration
